org.eclipse.ecf.call
Interface ICallContainerAdapter

public interface ICallContainerAdapter

Call session container entry point adapter. This interface is an adapter to allow providers to expose call sessions to clients. It may be used in the following way: 

  ICallContainerAdapter callcontainer = (ICallContainerAdapter) container.getAdapter(ICallContainerAdapter.class);
  if (callcontainer != null) {
     // use callcontainer to create call sessions
     ...
  } else {
     // container does not support call container functionality
  }

createCallSession

ICallSession createCallSession()
                               throws ECFException
Create call session within container. A call session instance is used to setup a call

Returns:
ICallSession the new call session
Throws:
ECFException - thrown if some problem with creating new call session

ICallSession createCallSession(ID sessionID)
                               throws ECFException
Create call session within container. A call session instance is used to setup a call

Parameters:

Returns:
ICallSession the new call session
Throws:
ECFException - thrown if some problem with creating new call session

getCallSession

ICallSession getCallSession(ID callSessionID)
Get call session with given ID.

Parameters:
callSessionID - the ID of the call session to get
Returns:
ICallSession of call session within container with given ID. Returns null if call session not found.

removeCallSession

boolean removeCallSession(ID callSessionID)
Remove call session with given ID

Parameters:
callSessionID - the ID of the call session to remove within this container
Returns:
true if call session found and removed. False if call session not found within container.
